title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to the Buccaneers finally releasing WR Antonio Brown and why this was the most predictable outcome we should have seen coming. He talks about Jim Harbaugh potentially leaving for the NFL and why this one destination is a bad fit. He shares his Blazing 5 picks for the final week of the regular season. Plus, Titans S Kevin Byard joins the show to explain why they are the most underrated team in the league right now. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
